kpi_info.title: period_duration (period_duration)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes.

kpi_info.title: IS_HHO_ATT_RT_OP (M1034C0)
kpi_info.use: The number of inter-system handover attempts for RT. The call is considered as RT from handover point of view when at least one RT RAB exists. Only the SRNC can update the counter. This counter is updated in the cell that is the best cell in the active set on the SRNC side when the RNC starts the HHO attempt. UPDATED: For CS RT RABs: When the inter-system HHO attempt is started (RANAP: RELOCATION REQUIRED message sent to CN). For PS RT RABs: If no CS RT RABs exist, this counter is updated when RRC: CELL CHANGE ORDER FROM UTRAN message is sent to the UE. If there are also CS RT RABs (Multi-RAB), this counter is updated when RANAP: RELOCATION REQUIRED message is sent to CN.

kpi_info.title: SUCC_IS_HHO_RT_OP (M1034C1)
kpi_info.use: The number of successful inter-system handovers for RT. The call is considered as RT from handover point of view when at least one RT RAB exists. Only the SRNC can update the counter. This counter is updated in the cell that is the best cell in the active set on the SRNC side when the RNC starts the HHO attempt. UPDATED: When the CN (core network) initiates the release of the Iu connections to the source RNC by sending the RANAP:IU RELEASE COMMAND message after successful inter-system handover.

kpi_info.title: IS_HHO_ATT_NRT_OP (M1034C2)
kpi_info.use: The number of inter-system handover attempts for NRT. The call is considered as NRT from handover point of view when only NRT RABs exist. Only the SRNC can update the counter. This counter is updated in the cell that is the best cell in the active set on the SRNC side when the RNC starts the HHO attempt. UPDATED: After handover decision, when the RNC sends the RRC: CELL CHANGE ORDER FROM UTRAN message to the UE. This counter is updated for any trigger reason.

kpi_info.title: SUCC_IS_HHO_NRT_OP (M1034C3)
kpi_info.use: The number of successful inter-system handovers for NRT. The call is considered as NRT from handover point of view when only NRT RABs exist. Only the SRNC can update the counter. This counter is updated in the cell that is the best cell in the active set on the SRNC side when the RNC starts the HHO attempt. UPDATED: When the source RNC receives an RANAP: IU RELEASE COMMAND message with a normal release cause from the CN - when inter-system handover procedure is ongoing.

kpi_info.title: CS_DCH_DL_DATA_VOL_OP (M1034C4)
kpi_info.use: The amount of MAC-d PDU data transferred in the CS Call DCH in the downlink direction during the measurement interval. This counter includes AMR, CS Streaming, and CS Conversational calls. UPDATED: The counter is updated at 20-second intervals, and when the connection is released or the active set is changed.

kpi_info.title: CS_DCH_UL_DATA_VOL_OP (M1034C5)
kpi_info.use: The amount of MAC-d PDU data transferred in the CS Call DCH in the uplink direction during the measurement interval. This counter includes AMR, CS Streaming, and CS Conversational calls. UPDATED: The counter is updated at 20-second intervals, and when the connection is released or the active set is changed.

kpi_info.title: PS_R99_DCH_DL_DATA_VOL_OP (M1034C6)
kpi_info.use: The amount of MAC-d PDU data transferred in the RT PS DCH and NRT DCH in the downlink direction during the measurement interval. UPDATED: The counter is updated at 20-second intervals, and when the connection is released or the active set is changed.

kpi_info.title: PS_R99_DCH_UL_DATA_VOL_OP (M1034C7)
kpi_info.use: The amount of MAC-d PDU data transferred in the DCH in the uplink direction during the measurement interval. UPDATED: The counter is updated at 20-second intervals, and when the connection is released or the active set is changed.

kpi_info.title: MAX_R99_DL_CODES_SF256_OP (M1034C8)
kpi_info.use: The maximum amount of Rel99 DL spreading codes allocated during the measurement interval for the reported Operator-ID. The amount of codes is represented by SF256 level so for example one SF128 code contributes to the counter by value 2, and one SF64 code by value 4. UPDATED: The code utilization is sampled with 1-second intervals.

kpi_info.title: SUM_R99_DL_CODES_SF256_OP (M1034C9)
kpi_info.use: This counter, divided by the denominator counter M1034C10, indicates the average number of allocated Rel99 DL codes represented by SF256 level. For example one DCH using SF128 updates the counter by value 2 and one DCH using SF64 updates the counter by value 4. UPDATED: The code utilization is sampled with 1-second intervals.

kpi_info.title: DENOM_R99_DL_CODES_SF256_OP (M1034C10)
kpi_info.use: Denominator for calculating average number of allocated Rel99 DL codes. This counter is updated by value 1 when the amount of codes is sampled to counter M1034C9. UPDATED: The code utilization is sampled with 1-second intervals.

kpi_info.title: RAB_STP_ATT_CS_VOICE_OP (M1034C11)
kpi_info.use: "The number of RAB setup attempts for CS voice calls.This includes also incoming SRNC relocations, hard handovers and inter-system handovers. UPDATED: When the RNC receives an RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT REQUEST message, the purpose of which is to initate the establishment of a new CS voice RAB, or when the RNC receives RANAP: RELOCATION REQUEST."

kpi_info.title: RAB_ACC_COMP_CS_VOICE_OP (M1034C12)
kpi_info.use: The number of completed RAB access phases for CS voice calls. This includes also incoming SRNC relocations, hard handovers and inter-system handovers. UPDATED: When the RNC sends an RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT RESPONSE to the CN after successful RAB establishment for CS voice call. In case of incoming hard handover or relocation the trigger is RANAP: RELOCATION COMPLETE.

kpi_info.title: RAB_STP_ATT_CS_CONV_OP (M1034C13)
kpi_info.use: "The number of RAB setup attempts for CS data conversational calls.This includes also incoming SRNC relocations, hard handovers and inter-system handovers. UPDATED: When the RNC receives an RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT REQUEST message, the purpose of which is to initate the establishment of a new CS data conversational RAB, or when the RNC receives RANAP: RELOCATION REQUEST."

kpi_info.title: RAB_ACC_COMP_CS_CONV_OP (M1034C14)
kpi_info.use: The number of completed RAB access phases for CS data conversational calls. This includes also incoming SRNC relocations, hard handovers and inter-system handovers. UPDATED: When the RNC sends an RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT RESPONSE to the CN after successful RAB establishment for CS data conversational call. In case of incoming hard handover or relocation the trigger is RANAP: RELOCATION COMPLETE.

kpi_info.title: RAB_STP_ATT_PS_STREA_OP (M1034C15)
kpi_info.use: "The number of RAB setup attempts for PS data streaming calls.This includes also incoming SRNC relocations, hard handovers and inter-system handovers. UPDATED: When the RNC receives an RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT REQUEST message, the purpose of which is to initate the establishment of a new PS data streaming RAB, or when the RNC receives RANAP: RELOCATION REQUEST."

kpi_info.title: RAB_ACC_COMP_PS_STREA_OP (M1034C16)
kpi_info.use: The number of completed RAB access phases for PS data streaming calls. This includes also incoming SRNC relocations, hard handovers and inter-system handovers. UPDATED: When the RNC sends an RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT RESPONSE to the CN after successful RAB establishment for PS data streaming call. In case of incoming hard handover or relocation the trigger is RANAP: RELOCATION COMPLETE.

kpi_info.title: RAB_STP_ATT_PS_NRT_OP (M1034C17)
kpi_info.use: "The number of RAB setup attempts for PS data interactive and background calls.This includes also incoming SRNC relocations, hard handovers and inter-system handovers. UPDATED: When the RNC receives an RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT REQUEST message, the purpose of which is to initate the establishment of a new PS data interactive or background RAB, or when the RNC receives RANAP: RELOCATION REQUEST."

kpi_info.title: RAB_ACC_COMP_PS_NRT_OP (M1034C18)
kpi_info.use: The number of completed RAB access phases for PS data interactive and background calls. This includes also incoming SRNC relocations, hard handovers and inter-system handovers. UPDATED: When the RNC sends an RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT RESPONSE to the CN after successful RAB establishment for PS data interactive or background call. In case of incoming hard handover or relocation the trigger is RANAP: RELOCATION COMPLETE.

kpi_info.title: RAB_ACT_COMP_CS_VOICE_OP (M1034C19)
kpi_info.use: The number of normal completions of RAB active phases for CS voice calls. This includes also outgoing SRNC relocations, hard handovers and inter-system handovers. UPDATED: When the RNC sends an RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT RESPONSE or RANAP: IU RELEASE COMPLETE to the CN after normal RAB release or relocation/HHO/ISHO for CS voice call.

kpi_info.title: RAB_ACT_FAIL_CS_VOICE_OP (M1034C20)
kpi_info.use: The number of RAB active failures for CS Voice Calls. UPDATED: When CS Voice RAB fails in active phase.

kpi_info.title: RAB_ACT_COMP_CS_CONV_OP (M1034C21)
kpi_info.use: The number of normal completions of RAB active phases for CS data conversational calls. This includes also outgoing SRNC relocations, hard handovers and inter-system handovers. UPDATED: When the RNC sends an RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT RESPONSE or RANAP: IU RELEASE COMPLETE to the CN after normal RAB release or relocation/HHO/ISHO for CS data conversational call.

kpi_info.title: RAB_ACT_FAIL_CS_CONV_OP (M1034C22)
kpi_info.use: The number of RAB active failures for CS Data Conversational Calls. UPDATED: When CS Conversational RAB fails in active phase.

kpi_info.title: RAB_ACT_COMP_PS_STREA_OP (M1034C23)
kpi_info.use: The number of normal completions of RAB active phases for PS data streaming calls. This includes also outgoing SRNC relocations, hard handovers and inter-system handovers. UPDATED: When the RNC sends an RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT RESPONSE or RANAP: IU RELEASE COMPLETE to the CN after normal RAB release or relocation/HHO/ISHO for PS data streaming call.

kpi_info.title: RAB_ACT_FAIL_PS_STREA_OP (M1034C24)
kpi_info.use: The number of RAB active failures for PS Calls with streaming class. UPDATED: When PS Streaming RAB fails in active phase.

kpi_info.title: RAB_ACT_COMP_PS_NRT_OP (M1034C25)
kpi_info.use: The number of normal completions of RAB active phases for PS data interactive and background calls. This includes also outgoing SRNC relocations, hard handovers and inter-system handovers. UPDATED: When the RNC sends an RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT RESPONSE or RANAP: IU RELEASE COMPLETE to the CN after normal RAB release or relocation/HHO/ISHO for PS data interactive or background call.

kpi_info.title: RAB_ACT_FAIL_PS_NRT_OP (M1034C26)
kpi_info.use: The number of RAB active failures for PS Calls with interactive and background class. UPDATED: When PS NRT RAB fails in active phase.

kpi_info.title: SUM_RAB_HLD_TM_CS_VOICE_OP (M1034C27)
kpi_info.use: This counter measures the RAB holding time of CS voice calls. This counter divided by (M1034C19+M1034C20) gives the average holding time for the RAB type in question. UPDATED: When a RAB is released or outgoing relocation/HHO/ISHO happens. This counter is updated in the cell where the RAB was released.

kpi_info.title: SUM_RAB_HLD_TM_CS_CONV_OP (M1034C28)
kpi_info.use: This counter measures the RAB holding time of a CS Data Call with conversational class.This counter divided by (M1034C21+M1034C22) gives the average holding time for the RAB type in question. UPDATED: When a RAB is released or outgoing relocation/HHO/ISHO happens. This counter is updated in the cell where the RAB was released.

kpi_info.title: SUM_RAB_HLD_TM_PS_STREA_OP (M1034C29)
kpi_info.use: This counter measures the RAB holding time of PS Data Calls with streaming class.This counter divided by (M1034C23+M1034C24) gives the average holding time for the RAB type in question. UPDATED: When a RAB is released or outgoing relocation/HHO/ISHO happens. This counter is updated in the cell where the RAB was released.

kpi_info.title: SUM_RAB_HLD_TM_PS_NRT_OP (M1034C30)
kpi_info.use: This counter measures the RAB holding time of PS Data Calls with interactive and background class. This counter divided by (M1034C25+M1034C26) gives the average holding time for the RAB type in question. UPDATED: When a RAB is released or outgoing relocation/HHO/ISHO happens. This counter is updated in the cell where the RAB was released.

kpi_info.title: MAX_HSDPA_USERS_IN_CELL_OP (M1034C31)
kpi_info.use: The maximum number of simultaneous HSDPA users in the cell per operator. In this context "HSDPA user" means a user whose HS-DSCH serving cell is located in the reported cell, regardless of whether the uplink is Rel99 or E-DCH. UPDATED: The number of HSDPA users is sampled with one-second interval.

kpi_info.title: MAX_HSUPA_USERS_IN_CELL_OP (M1034C32)
kpi_info.use: The maximum number of simultaneous HSUPA users per cell. Includes both serving and non-serving E-DCH radio links. UPDATED: The number of HSUPA users is sampled with one-second interval.

kpi_info.title: SUM_HSDPA_USERS_IN_CELL_OP (M1034C33)
kpi_info.use: The sum of sampled values for measuring the number of simultaneous HSDPA users in the cell per operator. In this context "HSDPA user" means a user whose HS-DSCH serving cell is located in the reported cell, regardless of whether the uplink is Rel99 or E-DCH. This counter, divided by the denominator M1034C35 provides the average number of HSDPA users in the cell per operator. UPDATED: The number of HSDPA users is sampled with one-second interval and summed by this counter.

kpi_info.title: SUM_HSUPA_USERS_IN_CELL_OP (M1034C34)
kpi_info.use: The sum of sampled values for measuring the number of simultaneous HSUPA users in the cell. This counter, divided by the denominator M1034C35 provides the average number of HSUPA users (E-DCH allocations) in the cell. Includes both serving and non-serving E-DCH radio links. UPDATED: The number of HSUPA users is sampled with one-second interval and summed by this counter.

kpi_info.title: DENOM_HSPA_USERS_IN_CELL_OP (M1034C35)
kpi_info.use: The number of samples taken for counter M1034C34 and M1034C35, used as a denominator for average calculation. UPDATED: Updated by value 1 when the number of HSDPA users is summed by counter M1034C34 or when number of HSUPA users is summed by counter M1034C35.

kpi_info.title: ALLO_SUCCESS_HS_DSCH_OP (M1034C36)
kpi_info.use: "The number of HS-DSCH allocations in the SRNC.Also one of M1002 HS-DSCH allocation counters M1002C385, M1002C389, M1002C569, M1002C652, M1002C653 or M1002C654 is updated along with this counter. UPDATED: When HS-DSCH has been successfully allocated either as initial allocation, serving cell change, hard handover or channel type switch."

kpi_info.title: ALLO_SUCCESS_EDCH_OP (M1034C37)
kpi_info.use: "The number of successful E-DCH allocations in the SRNC.Also one of M1002 E-DCH allocation counters M1002C531, M1002C532, M1002C607, M1002C658, M1002C659 or M1002C660 is updated along with this counter. UPDATED: When E-DCH has been successfully allocated either as initial allocation, serving cell change, soft handover branch addition, hard handover or channel type switch."

kpi_info.title: DCH_SEL_MAX_HSDPA_USERS_OP (M1034C38)
kpi_info.use: "The number of times when the DCH channel type is selected for interactive or background class connections due to maximum amount of HSDPA users or MAC-d flows in the WBTS, local cell group or cell.The counter is updated only in the initial user plane allocations and hard handovers, it is not updated if DCH x/y to HSDPA switch or serving cell change fails due to the maximum number of users reached. UPDATED: When during channel type selection phase HS-DSCH cannot be allocated due to maximum amount of HSDPA users or MAC-d flows in the WBTS, local cell group scheduler or cell."

kpi_info.title: REJ_HS_DSCH_RET_OP (M1034C39)
kpi_info.use: The number of failed allocations for the HS-DSCH transport channel due to lack of radio resources for the UL DCH return channel for interactive or background class connections. After rejection the capacity request is sent back to the PS queue and the HS-DSCH channel type is not allowed for this capacity request any more. UPDATED: When UL DCH for HS-DSCH return channel cannot be allocated due to radio interface admission control reasons..

kpi_info.title: SETUP_FAIL_HS_DSCH_OP (M1034C40)
kpi_info.use: The number of HS-DSCH setup failures due to reasons not covered by admission control related counters M1034C38, M1034C39 or M1034C41. UPDATED: When the HS-DSCH allocation fails during initial allocation, channel type switch, serving cell change or HHO.

kpi_info.title: DL_DCH_SEL_HSDPA_POWER_OP (M1034C41)
kpi_info.use: The number of times when the HS-DSCH downlink transport channel cannot be selected for an interactive or a background class connection due to downlink power limits. UPDATED: When the HS-DSCH cannot be selected as a downlink transport channel due to PtxTotal>PtxTargetHSDPA or PtxNC>PtxTargetHSDPA conditions. This can happen only if static HSDPA resource allocation is used.

kpi_info.title: EDCH_ALLO_CANC_NA_AS_OP (M1034C42)
kpi_info.use: The number of times when the E-DCH allocation made by the cell specific packet scheduler is cancelled due to a non-acceptable E-DCH active set. UPDATED: When a cell selected for the preliminary E-DCH active set is not included in the final E-DCH active set because the cell does not satisfy the E-DCH active set acceptance condition 'CPICHEcNoNonEDCHNCell

kpi_info.title: UL_DCH_SEL_MAX_HSUPA_USR_OP (M1034C43)
kpi_info.use: The number of times when the E-DCH uplink transport channel cannot be selected for this cell due to maximum amount of E-DCH users in the cell or in the local cell group. UPDATED: When the E-DCH cannot be selected as the uplink transport channel in this cell because the number of E-DCH users in the cell would exceed the limit defined by MaxNumberEDCHCell or the number of E-DCH users in local cell group would exceed MaxNumberEDCHLCG

kpi_info.title: UL_DCH_SEL_BTS_HW_OP (M1034C44)
kpi_info.use: The number of times when the E-DCH uplink transport channel cannot be selected for this cell because the BTS has reported that it has no capacity available for the E-DCH. UPDATED: When the E-DCH cannot be selected as the uplink transport channel in this cell because the BTS has reported with an RADIO RESOURCE MEASUREMENT REPORT message to be in a state where there is no capacity available for the E-DCH.

kpi_info.title: SETUP_FAIL_EDCH_OP (M1034C45)
kpi_info.use: The number of E-DCH setup failures due to reasons not covered by admission control related counters M1034C43, M1034C44 or M1034C46. UPDATED: When the E-DCH allocation fails for any reason during initial allocation, channel type switch, SHO branch addition or HHO.

kpi_info.title: SETUP_REJ_EDCH_AC_NRT_OP (M1034C46)
kpi_info.use: "The number of E-DCH setup failures due to uplink radio admission control for interactive and background class connections. UPDATED: When E-DCH cannot be setup due to uplink admission control rejection. This happens when the averaged estimated Rel99 interference exceeds the limit value defined as the maximum of the values of the management parameters PrxTarget, PrxTargetMax and PrxMaxTargetBTS.The counter is updated only for initial E-DCH allocation attempts, not for channel type switches or serving cell changes."

kpi_info.title: OPERATOR_SHARE_R99 (M1034C47)
kpi_info.use: The current value of parameter "WBTS-R99OperIdWeightPair-R99OperatorWeight" configured in the RNC for the reported cell and operator-ID. UPDATED: The parameter value is sampled with 15 minute intervals.

kpi_info.title: OPERATOR_SHARE_HSDPA (M1034C48)
kpi_info.use: The current value of parameter "WBTS-HSDPAOperIdWeightPair-HSDPAOperatorWeight" configured in the RNC for the reported cell and operator-ID. UPDATED: The parameter value is sampled with 15 minute intervals.
